sentences.sContent: In a word, love can bring us beautiful color to our life, while other people think love on campus is congruous.
sentences.sContent_eng: In a word, love can bring us beautiful color to our life, while other people think love on campus is congruous.
sentences.sCn: 一句话，爱能给我们带来美丽的颜色对我们的生活，而另一些人认为校园爱情是一致的。

sentences.sContent: The authors have proved that the two types of definitions are congruous by using limit theory, while discussing the correlation among the subclasses of heavy-tailed distributions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The authors have proved that the two types of definitions are congruous by using limit theory, while discussing the correlation among the subclasses of heavy-tailed distributions.
sentences.sCn: 利用分析中的极限理论等方法，证明了重尾分布的这两种定义是一致的，并给出了重尾分布子族间的相互关系。
